name: move_antennas
description:
Move the robot's antennas.

You can move one or both antennas. Leave None to keep current position.

optional.name: left
optional.description: Target position for left antenna (degrees, typically -45 to 45)

optional.name: right
optional.description: Target position for right antenna (degrees, typically -45 to 45)

optional.name: duration
optional.description: Duration of the movement in seconds
